00042 DynamicVariable::DynamicVariable()
00043     :duration_(1.0), rate_(DEFAULT_SAMPLING_RATE)
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00048 void DynamicVariable::setDuration(m_time_type duration)
00049 {
00050     duration_ = duration;
00051 }
00052 
00053 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00054 m_time_type DynamicVariable::getDuration()
00055 {
00056     return duration_;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00061 void DynamicVariable::setSamplingRate(m_rate_type rate)
00062 {
00063     rate_ = rate;
00064 }
00065 
00066 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00067 m_rate_type DynamicVariable::getSamplingRate()
00068 {
00069     return rate_;
00070 }
00071 
00072 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00073 m_sample_count_type DynamicVariable::getSampleCount()
00074 {
00075     return (m_sample_count_type) (rate_ * duration_);
00076 }

00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00079 //DynamicVariable* DynamicVariable::create_dv_from_xml(XmlReader::xmltag *dvtag, hash_map<long,DynamicVariable*> dvHash)
00080 DynamicVariable* DynamicVariable::create_dv_from_xml(XmlReader::xmltag *dvtag)
00081 {
00082         // First look up the dv_type which is always a child tag
00083 
00084         char *value=dvtag->findChildParamValue("dv_type","value");
00085 
00086         DynamicVariable *dv=NULL;
00087 
00088         // Make a new constant
00089         if(!strcmp(value,"constant"))
00090         {
00091                 Constant *constdv=new Constant;
00092                 constdv->xml_read(dvtag);
00093                 dv=constdv;
00094         }
00095         // Deprecated; ignoring.
00096 /*
00097         else if(!strcmp(value,"dvs"))
00098         {
00099                 value=dvtag->findChildParamValue("dv_ptr","value");
00100                 long id=atoi(value);
00101         }
00102 */
00103         else if(!strcmp(value,"envelope"))
00104         {
00105                 Envelope *envdv=new Envelope;
00106                 envdv->xml_read(dvtag);
00107                 dv=envdv;
00108         }
00109         else if(!strcmp(value,"interp"))
00110         {
00111                 int interp_type = atoi(dvtag->findChildParamValue("interp_type","value"));
00112                 Interpolator *interp=NULL;
00113                 if(interp_type == EXPONENTIAL)
00114                         interp = new ExponentialInterpolator;
00115                 else if(interp_type == LINEAR)
00116                         interp = new LinearInterpolator;                
00117                 else if(interp_type == CUBIC_SPLINE)
00118                         interp = new CubicSplineInterpolator;   
00119                 interp->xml_read(dvtag);
00120                 dv=interp;
00121         }
00122         
00123         if(!dv)
00124         {
00125                 printf("[%s:%d] Error creating DV: Unknown type %s\n",__FILE__,__LINE__,value);
00126                 return new Constant;
00127         }
00128 
00129         return dv;
00130 }
